title: Design a News Feed
problemStatement:
Design Design a News Feed
Design Design a News Feed
Design Design a News Feed
Build a Twitter-style feed. Users post and see chronologically ordered feed from people they follow.
functionalRequirements: Build a Twitter-style feed. Users post and see chronologically ordered feed from people they follow.
Build a Twitter-style feed. Users post and see chronologically ordered feed from people they follow.
nonFunctionalRequirements: System should be scalable and available
System should be scalable and available
System should be scalable and available
System should be scalable and available
System should be scalable and available
System should be scalable and available
constraintsAssumptions: Assume eventual consistency acceptable where appropriate

nodes.label: Web App / UI
nodes.description: Client-facing UI; calls APIs; manages user interactions.

notes.purpose: Client-facing UI; calls APIs; manages user interactions.

details.purpose: Client-facing UI; calls APIs; manages user interactions.

notes.purpose: Client-facing UI; calls APIs; manages user interactions.

reasons.text: User entry point for all actions

nodes.label: CDN
nodes.description: Caches and serves static and cacheable dynamic content close to users; reduces origin load.

notes.purpose: Caches and serves static and cacheable dynamic content close to users; reduces origin load.
keyDecisions: Cache media by content hash or path

details.purpose: Caches and serves static and cacheable dynamic content close to users; reduces origin load.

notes.purpose: Caches and serves static and cacheable dynamic content close to users; reduces origin load.
keyDecisions: Cache media by content hash or path

reasons.text: Cache miss falls back to origin; stale content risk

justification.tradeoffs: cache poisoning; stale content; origin overload when cache miss spikes
justification.failureModes: cache poisoning; stale content; origin overload when cache miss spikes

nodes.label: WAF
nodes.description: Blocks common web attacks (SQLi/XSS), bots, and abusive patterns at the edge.

notes.purpose: Blocks common web attacks (SQLi/XSS), bots, and abusive patterns at the edge.

details.purpose: Blocks common web attacks (SQLi/XSS), bots, and abusive patterns at the edge.

notes.purpose: Blocks common web attacks (SQLi/XSS), bots, and abusive patterns at the edge.

reasons.text: Mitigates attack traffic; false positives can block good traffic

justification.tradeoffs: false positives blocking good traffic; rules drift
justification.failureModes: false positives blocking good traffic; rules drift

nodes.label: Rate Limiter
nodes.description: Protects systems from overload and abuse; enforces per-user/IP/API limits.

notes.purpose: Protects systems from overload and abuse; enforces per-user/IP/API limits.
keyDecisions: Token bucket or sliding window per user/IP

details.purpose: Protects systems from overload and abuse; enforces per-user/IP/API limits.

notes.purpose: Protects systems from overload and abuse; enforces per-user/IP/API limits.
keyDecisions: Token bucket or sliding window per user/IP

justification.tradeoffs: hot keys on limiter storage; incorrect keying causing unfair limits
justification.failureModes: hot keys on limiter storage; incorrect keying causing unfair limits

nodes.label: API Gateway
nodes.description: Single entry point for APIs; handles routing, auth, quotas, request shaping.

notes.purpose: Single entry point for APIs; handles routing, auth, quotas, request shaping.
keyDecisions: Route by path/version; validate auth before backend
Centralize rate limits and request shaping
failureModes: SPOF; deploy HA with health checks

details.purpose: Single entry point for APIs; handles routing, auth, quotas, request shaping.

notes.purpose: Single entry point for APIs; handles routing, auth, quotas, request shaping.
keyDecisions: Route by path/version; validate auth before backend
Centralize rate limits and request shaping
failureModes: SPOF; deploy HA with health checks

justification.tradeoffs: single point of failure; misconfigured routing; latency overhead
justification.failureModes: single point of failure; misconfigured routing; latency overhead

nodes.label: Load Balancer (L7)
nodes.description: Distributes HTTP traffic across healthy instances; supports routing rules.

notes.purpose: Distributes HTTP traffic across healthy instances; supports routing rules.

details.purpose: Distributes HTTP traffic across healthy instances; supports routing rules.

notes.purpose: Distributes HTTP traffic across healthy instances; supports routing rules.

reasons.text: SPOF if single LB; health checks route around failures
Routes HTTP requests to app instances

justification.tradeoffs: bad health checks flapping; uneven load distribution
justification.failureModes: bad health checks flapping; uneven load distribution

nodes.label: App Service
nodes.description: Core business logic service handling requests and orchestrating dependencies.

notes.purpose: Core business logic service handling requests and orchestrating dependencies.

details.purpose: Core business logic service handling requests and orchestrating dependencies.

notes.purpose: Core business logic service handling requests and orchestrating dependencies.

reasons.text: Build a Twitter-style feed. Users post and see chronologically ordered feed from people they follow.
Stateless; instance failure only loses in-flight requests

justification.tradeoffs: dependency timeouts cascading; resource exhaustion; thundering herd
justification.failureModes: dependency timeouts cascading; resource exhaustion; thundering herd

nodes.label: Queue
nodes.description: Buffers tasks; decouples producers/consumers; smooths spikes.

notes.purpose: Buffers tasks; decouples producers/consumers; smooths spikes.

details.purpose: Buffers tasks; decouples producers/consumers; smooths spikes.

notes.purpose: Buffers tasks; decouples producers/consumers; smooths spikes.

reasons.text: Backlog growth if consumer slow; DLQ for poison msgs

justification.tradeoffs: backlog growth; duplicate delivery; hot partitions (FIFO)
justification.failureModes: backlog growth; duplicate delivery; hot partitions (FIFO)

nodes.label: Worker
nodes.description: Consumes async jobs/events; performs background processing.

notes.purpose: Consumes async jobs/events; performs background processing.

details.purpose: Consumes async jobs/events; performs background processing.

notes.purpose: Consumes async jobs/events; performs background processing.

justification.tradeoffs: poison messages; retry storms; duplicate processing
justification.failureModes: poison messages; retry storms; duplicate processing

nodes.label: Event Log / Stream
nodes.description: Durable ordered log for high-throughput event streaming and replay.

notes.purpose: Durable ordered log for high-throughput event streaming and replay.

details.purpose: Durable ordered log for high-throughput event streaming and replay.

notes.purpose: Durable ordered log for high-throughput event streaming and replay.

justification.tradeoffs: hot partition; consumer lag; rebalancing storms
justification.failureModes: hot partition; consumer lag; rebalancing storms

nodes.label: Pub/Sub
nodes.description: Broadcasts events to multiple subscribers; decouples publishers from consumers.

notes.purpose: Broadcasts events to multiple subscribers; decouples publishers from consumers.

details.purpose: Broadcasts events to multiple subscribers; decouples publishers from consumers.

notes.purpose: Broadcasts events to multiple subscribers; decouples publishers from consumers.

reasons.text: Slow consumer blocks others; use push/pull

nodes.label: SQL Database
nodes.description: Relational storage with transactions and strong consistency options.

notes.purpose: Relational storage with transactions and strong consistency options.

details.purpose: Relational storage with transactions and strong consistency options.

notes.purpose: Relational storage with transactions and strong consistency options.

reasons.text: Replication reduces data loss; failover to replica

justification.tradeoffs: lock contention; replication lag; hot rows
justification.failureModes: lock contention; replication lag; hot rows

nodes.label: SQL Read Replica
nodes.description: Scales reads; offloads primary; may have replication lag.

notes.purpose: Scales reads; offloads primary; may have replication lag.

details.purpose: Scales reads; offloads primary; may have replication lag.

notes.purpose: Scales reads; offloads primary; may have replication lag.

reasons.text: Replication lag; stale reads; failover complexity

justification.tradeoffs: stale reads due to lag; failover complexity
justification.failureModes: stale reads due to lag; failover complexity

nodes.label: Key-Value Store
nodes.description: Low-latency lookups by key; great for sessions, counters, mappings.

notes.purpose: Low-latency lookups by key; great for sessions, counters, mappings.

details.purpose: Low-latency lookups by key; great for sessions, counters, mappings.

notes.purpose: Low-latency lookups by key; great for sessions, counters, mappings.

reasons.text: Build a Twitter-style feed. Users post and see chronologically ordered feed from people they follow.

justification.tradeoffs: hot keys; uneven partitions; eventual consistency surprises
justification.failureModes: hot keys; uneven partitions; eventual consistency surprises

nodes.label: Cache
nodes.description: Speeds reads and reduces backend load; stores computed/queried data.

notes.purpose: Speeds reads and reduces backend load; stores computed/queried data.

details.purpose: Speeds reads and reduces backend load; stores computed/queried data.

notes.purpose: Speeds reads and reduces backend load; stores computed/queried data.

reasons.text: Stampede on miss; stale data; cache node failure

justification.tradeoffs: stampede on miss; stale data; cache node failure causing DB overload
justification.failureModes: stampede on miss; stale data; cache node failure causing DB overload

nodes.label: Metrics
nodes.description: Collects time-series measurements for monitoring and alerting.

notes.purpose: Collects time-series measurements for monitoring and alerting.

details.purpose: Collects time-series measurements for monitoring and alerting.

notes.purpose: Collects time-series measurements for monitoring and alerting.

justification.tradeoffs: high cardinality costs; missing metrics due to scraping issues
justification.failureModes: high cardinality costs; missing metrics due to scraping issues

nodes.label: Logging
nodes.description: Stores logs for debugging/auditing; supports search and retention.

notes.purpose: Stores logs for debugging/auditing; supports search and retention.

details.purpose: Stores logs for debugging/auditing; supports search and retention.

notes.purpose: Stores logs for debugging/auditing; supports search and retention.

justification.tradeoffs: PII leakage; cost explosion; missing correlation IDs
justification.failureModes: PII leakage; cost explosion; missing correlation IDs
